about.title: ABOUT ME
about.subtitle: Passionate about cybersecurity and web development
description: I'm a cybersecurity engineering student at Télécom SudParis, Institut Polytechnique de Paris, with a particular interest in network security and web development.
Throughout my journey, I've gained skills in programming, computer security, and system administration, which I apply in both personal and professional projects.
My philosophy is centered on creating solutions that combine security, performance, and user experience.
